sentences.en: ...a sweetish smell of ether and iodine.
sentences.cn: ...乙醚和碘酒散发出的微甜味。

sentences.en: Ain, Rimmon, and Ether, and Ashan : four cities with their villages.
sentences.cn: 7又有亚因 、 利门 、 以帖 、 亚珊,共四座城,还有属城的村庄.

sentences.en: And a high molecular weight poly ( arylene ether nitrile sulfone ) has obtained.
sentences.cn: 获得了高分子量的 聚芳醚 腈砜.

sentences.en: Cellulose ether nitrate as novel energetic adhesive for solid propellant was synthesized.
sentences.cn: 以棉纤维为原料,合成了一种新型推进剂用含能黏合剂纤维素醚硝酸酯.

sentences.en: It was once believed that light waves traveled through the ether.
sentences.cn: 人们曾经相信光波在以太中穿过.

sentences.en: Kaposi acrylic foam bonded to the allyl ether of sucrose polymers, acidic.
sentences.cn: 卡波沫为丙烯酸键合蔗糖的烯丙基醚的聚合物, 呈酸性.

sentences.en: Maxwell's field equations described this measurable disturbance of the medium without explicitly discussing the ether itself.
sentences.cn: 麦克斯韦电磁场方程描写了媒质的这种可测量的扰动,而不去详细讨论以太本身.

sentences.en: Phenoxyethanol ( PE ) , a preservative with aromatic ether, is used in cosmetics.
sentences.cn: 苯氧 乙醇被使用在化妆品中, 是一种含有芳香醚的防腐剂.

sentences.en: Purification of diphenyl ether by crystallization without solvent is discussed.
sentences.cn: 用无溶剂结晶法纯制二苯醚,该方法具有高效、经济和洁净的特点.

sentences.en: The dispersant are alcohol, ether, alcohol - benzene component solvent or non - proton polar solvent.
sentences.cn: 分散剂为醇 、 醚 、 醇 - 苯混合溶剂或 非 质子极性溶剂.

sentences.en: The fragmentation reactions of the saturated urushiol biscrown ether sized paper.
sentences.cn: 本文总结了饱和漆酚双冠醚电子电离质谱的裂解规律.

sentences.en: The null result of the Michelson - Morley experiment suggests that the effects of the ether are undetectable.
sentences.cn: 迈克耳 孙- 莫雷实验的否定结果使人想到,以太的效应是不能检查到的.

sentences.en: The result showed that polyethylene glycol diglycidyl ether cross linked sericin obviously.
sentences.cn: 结果表明,聚乙二醇缩水甘油醚对丝胶蛋白具有明显的交联作用.

sentences.en: The silicone quaternary was synthesized reaction of - H silicone, unsaturated - ether, chloroacetic acid, dimethylamine.
sentences.cn: 以低含氢硅油 、 不饱和聚醚 、 一氯乙酸和二甲胺为原料, 制备得阳离子有机硅油.

sentences.en: They imagined the existence of a physical medium - the ether - filling all of space.
sentences.cn: 他们想象存在一种充满整个空间的物理介质 -- 以太.

sentences.en: Today's news goes into the ether and is soon forgotten.
sentences.cn: 今天的新闻广播听后不久即置于脑后了.

[药]乙醚；[有化]以太；苍天；天空醚

trans.tran_cn: <化>醚，the ether 苍穹，苍天，太空
trans.tran_en: a clear liquid used in the past as an anaesthetic to make people sleep before an operation
